mapper.select: SELECT h.*, (SELECT AVG(rating) FROM hospital_review r WHERE r.hospital_id = h.hospital_id) AS avg_rating FROM hospital_info h
SELECT h.*, (SELECT AVG(rating) FROM hospital_review r_avg WHERE r_avg.hospital_id = h.hospital_id) AS avg_rating FROM hospital_info h WHERE h.hospital_id = #{hospitalId}
SELECT pa.animal_id, pa.species FROM possible_animal pa JOIN hospital_animal ha ON pa.animal_id = ha.animal_id WHERE ha.hospital_id = #{hospitalId}
SELECT s.specialty_id, s.category FROM specialty s JOIN hospital_specialty hs ON s.specialty_id = hs.specialty_id WHERE hs.hospital_id = #{hospitalId}
SELECT r.*, u.nickname FROM hospital_review r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hospital_info (name, address, homepage, phone, email, thumbnail_image_url, hosp_introduce) VALUES (#{name}, #{address}, #{homepage}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{thumbnailImageUrl}, #{hospIntroduce})
mapper.update: UPDATE hospital_info SET name = #{name}, address = #{address}, homepage = #{homepage}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, thumbnail_image_url = #{thumbnailImageUrl}, hosp_introduce = #{hospIntroduce} WHERE hospital_id = #{hospitalId}
